content.title: I-vietopik-funda iKorea imahla
content.learnKorean: Funda iKorea inezifundo eziphakathi eziphezulu kwiingcali ngeyona ndleko.
content.learnFromExperts: Funda kwizithethi zemveli kunye nootitshala abanamava.
content.learnAtYourOwnPace: Funda ngesantya sakho ngokungena kumda kwizifundo.
content.coverAllAspects: Ukusuka ekuqalekeni kwamanqanaba aphezulu, egubungela igrama, isigama, kunye nengxoxo.

testimonial1.quote: "Vietopik yandinceda ukuba ndilungiselele uviwo lwam oluphezulu. Izifundo zilungelelaniswe kakuhle kwaye kulula ukuzilandela!"
testimonial1.name: Nguyen Minh Anh

testimonial2.quote: "Ukufunda iKorea ayikaze kube lula! Izifundo ezakhiweyo zenza yonke into ilula kwaye imnandi."
testimonial2.name: Tran hai nam

testimonial3.quote: "Enkosi kwi-vietopik, izakhono zam zokumamela kunye nokuthetha ziphucule kakhulu kwiinyanga nje ezintathu!"
testimonial3.name: Leh huong

content.yourOneStopShop: Iqonga lakho lokumisa elinye lokufundisa iKorea. Fikelela ubutyebi be-premiyamu kwaye ufezekise iinjongo zolwimi lwakho namhlanje!

metadata.lesson: Jonga izifundo zethu zakutshanje kwaye ufumane into oza kuyithanda.
